imputegap.tools package¶

Submodules¶

imputegap.tools.algorithm_parameters module¶

imputegap.tools.evaluation module¶

class imputegap.tools.evaluation.Evaluation(ground_truth, imputation, contamination)¶

Bases: object

compute_correlation()¶

Computes the Pearson correlation coefficient only for the positions where there are NaN values in the contamination.

Returns:

the Pearson correlation coefficient between ground truth and imputation for NaN positions in contamination.

compute_mae()¶

Computes MAE only for the positions where there are NaN values in the contamination. :return : the mean absolute error between ground truth and imputation for NaN positions in contamination.

compute_mi()¶

Computes Mutual Information (MI) only for the positions where there are NaN values in the contamination. :return : the mutual information between ground truth and imputation for NaN positions in contamination.

compute_rmse()¶

Compute the RMSE score based on the ground_truth, the imputation values and the contamination set :return: the RMSE score between ground truth and imputation for NaN positions in contamination.

metrics_computation()¶

Compute the metrics to express the results of the imputation based on the ground truth and the contamination set

Parameters:

  • ground_truth – original time series without contamination

  • imputation – new time series with imputation values

  • contamination – time series with contamination

Returns:

metrics, dictionary containing each metric of the imputation

imputegap.tools.utils module¶

imputegap.tools.utils.display_title(title='Master Thesis', aut='Quentin Nater', lib='ImputeGAP', university='University Fribourg - exascale infolab')¶
imputegap.tools.utils.format_selection(ts, selection)¶

Format the selection of series based on keywords :author: Quentin Nater

Parameters:

  • selection – current selection of series

  • ts – dataset to contaminate

:return series_selected : correct format of selection series

imputegap.tools.utils.get_save_path_asset()¶

Find the accurate path for saving files of tests :return: correct file paths

imputegap.tools.utils.load_parameters(query: str = 'default', algorithm: str = 'cdrec', dataset: str = 'chlorine', optimizer: str = 'b', path=None)¶

Load default values of algorithms

:param query : (‘optimal’ or ‘default’), load default or optimal parameters for algorithms | default “default” :param algorithm : algorithm parameters to load | default “cdrec”

Returns:

tuples of optimal parameters and the config of default values

imputegap.tools.utils.search_path(set_name='test')¶

Find the accurate path for loading files of tests :return: correct file paths

imputegap.tools.utils.verification_limitation(percentage, low_limit=0.01, high_limit=1.0)¶

Format the percentage given by the user. :param percentage: The percentage to be checked. :param low_limit: The lower limit of the acceptable percentage range. :param high_limit: The upper limit of the acceptable percentage range. :return: Adjusted percentage.
